result.title: Solution
result.content:
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main () {

    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
        int k;
        string x;
        cin >> k >> x;
        int cnt = 0;
        if (k + 1 == x.size ()) {
            bool flag = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < x.size (); ++i) {
                if (x[i] == '0')
                    flag = 1;
            }
            if (flag)
                cout << 0 << endl;
            else
                cout << -1 << endl;
            continue;
        }
        if (k + 2 == x.size ()) {
            cout << "-1\n";
            continue;
        }
        string ans;
        for (int i = x.size () - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
            if (cnt < 2) {
                if (x[i] == '0')
                    ans += '0', ++cnt;
                else
                    --k;
            } else {
                if (k > 0)
                    --k;
                else
                    ans += x[i];
            }
        }
        if (k != 0 || cnt < 2) {
            cout << -1 << endl;
            continue;
        }
        reverse (ans.begin (), ans.end ());
        for (int i = 0; i < ans.size (); ++i)
            cout << ans[i];
        cout << endl;
    }


    return 0;
}
